pages.text: This world - vast and neverending - contains many'a'biome. Most biomes are what one might expect, ranging from flat to mountainous, from warm to frigid, from tall to deep.$(br2)Some biomes, however, are magical sights to be seen, explored, and tapped into.
I will use this section of my journal to record my findings of each biomes I come across with unique magical properties.

pages.text_right: Lore tells of a compass capable of pointing towards specified biomes.$(br2)Making one of these should help me locate biomes of my choosing.

pages.title: Mystic Grove
pages.text: These colorful pastel biomes are the home of the fae.$(br2)The mystical forests contain a plethora of magical trees and wonderous flora, useful for a variety of magical purposes.

pages.title: Defiled Lands
pages.text: A foul magick has corrupted parts of the world, leading to a spreading decay and defilement of the area.$(br2)Curiously, though, new life has thrived here, albeit disturbing.

pages.title: Ominous Woods
pages.text: A dark, mysterious aura precides over this biome.$(br2)Home to umbral trees and other eerie flora, ever clouded by a dark, creeping fog.
